aboutMeText: I am a developer based in Amsterdam with a passion for building stuff for the web. I have a strong background in design which combined with my passion for solving real-life problems with code allows me to take on new challenges confidently. When offline, I enjoy long walks with (and without) my camera, reading and drawing.
scrollDown: Scroll down for a quick look at some of my projects
